@ChrisFerdinandi @Netlify @smashingmag Yeah, that's typically the compromise. E-commerce as a PE. It depends on the service you integrate with. Although you could proxy to Lambda and do all custom queries and return populated views w/o javascript to get best of both! Hint: check out the Netlify Functions alpha!
